price: Maka ketika Ibrāhīm  sudah menjauhkan diri dari mereka dan dari apa yang mereka sembah selain Allah, Kami anugerahkan kepadanya Isḥāq dan Ya`qūb.  Dan masing-masingnya, Kami angkat menjadi nabi.
arabic: فَلَمَّا ٱعۡتَزَلَهُمۡ وَمَا يَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَۖ وَكُلّٗا جَعَلۡنَا نَبِيّٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā iʿ'tazalahum wamā yaʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi wahabnā lahu is'ḥāqa wayaʿqūba wakullan jaʿalnā nabiyyan
